amendment.description: An amendment numbered 53 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to add at the end of title I the following section entitled: Corps of Engineers Continuing Authorities Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moulton amendment (A052) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A052) offered by Mr. Moulton.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Moulton amendment (A052) Agreed to by voice vote.
